preMessage01.text: a friend of your cousin just said that

preMessage02.text: the mother of a friend told me that

preMessage03.text: i heard from trustworthy sources that

preMessage05.text: Your cousin has informed me that

preMessage06.text: our neighbour talked to a friend in the army.

preMessage07.text: your brother called and told me

preMessage10.text: i just listened to the radio. They said that

preMessage12.text: your father wants you to know that

preMessage13.text: your cousin saw a tweet that claimed that

message01.text: a man was stoned in the village ahead

message02.text: a black flag has been raised over a mosque in the town ahead

message03.text: government forces have been executed in the area ahead of you

message05.text: fanatics are conducting artillery strikes near you

message06.text: rebels are shooting with mortars at units ahead of you
